channel.title: light adaption of the ranking guide
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "light adaption of the ranking guide" - adaption of small things

item.title: Re: light adaption of the ranking guide
item.content:encoded: sorry, i didn't know it, that there is a seperate forum.

item.title: Re: light adaption of the ranking guide
item.content:encoded:
Both things you mentioned are correct. Tthe XP Guide is fairly outdated as there's additional possibilities with the addition of the juice bar and the burgerninja upgrade, as well.

However this is the wrong forum to be posting such things. This is for general bvs discussions, there's a separate forum for wiki-related content. But that's not all that important I suppose. If you want to go ahead and update it feel free to do so. I'd do it myself but I'm feeling a bit lazy.

item.title: light adaption of the ranking guide
item.content:encoded:
i have read the ranking guide and found some outdated information:

-> strawberry lv3 provides also ranking-xp (+50%)
-> you can't get stamina through pictures -> i guess the stamina per hour-function is the replacement of it (please correct me if i'm wrong)
